Title: Limits that provision permitting the commissioner of motor vehicles to suspend the license or registration of a person whose check is dishonored
Summary: Limits the provision permitting the commissioner of motor vehicles to suspend the license or registration of a person whose check is dishonored after presented to such commissioner for payment.
LawCode: Amd ยง202-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to dishonored check fees
